document.full_text: a new amazon.com inc service that lets customers store songs and play them on a variety of phones and computers is facing a backlash from the music industry that could ignite a legal battle.
document.title: amazon faces backlash over "music locker" service
lines_and_colors: a new amazon.com inc service that lets customers store songs and play them on a variety of phones and computers is facing a backlash from the music industry that could ignite a legal battle.
